description: Arcueid is the last living True Ancestor. Naive, cheerful, whimsical and somewhat selfish, she has little knowledge of present day customs making her seem childish. All the same, she is very powerful, and there are few in the entire world who could actually oppose her in combat. Arcueid is very possessive of Shiki, often childishly claiming him as "hers".
name: Arcueid Brunestud
